About Jonathan Simcoe @jdsimcoe

Learn more about this styleguide guy named Jonathan, particularly how it‚Äôs he's built and who maintains it him.

What and why

I love Jesus, my wife, and our four beautiful kids. I enjoy discovering the world behind a camera lens and through written words. I like exploring new technologies and using code and design to bring ideas into being. I believe that nobody can be the best version of themselves without being surrounded by great people.

Browser support

Jonathan heartily supports and encourages all of the modern browsers. Long live ES6! üéâ  Yay CSS Grids (I'm looking at you Firefox 52). üòâ

Future updates

I don't have my own Roadmap (at least not one that I'm privy to) but I do have a sense that the future is bright. As the Internet and open source both continue to grow, the way that people interact with technology and with each other is in constant flux. It is an exciting time to be a designer, and to be able to design for the humans that use the web.
